title: RIOT please, I'm begging!
body:
Give me back my WotA. It's complete bullshit that any AP champ that wants sustain has to build a fucking gunblade. While gunblade is ideal for Akali, Katarina, Mordekaiser, Fizz, Diana. I used to use WotA for so many champs and gunblade isn't a substitution for ranged mages like Vlad, Morgana, Lux, Karma, Ryze, Zyra, Heimer, etc 

PLEASE BRING WOTA BACK!

replies.body:
WoTA promoted a sustain meta due to the Spell Vamp that it had, and how useful it was to the wrong champions.
Sustain in the game is ultimately unhealthy for the game.
The reason why Gunblade has Spell Vamp on it is exactly because of the champions that _ actually_ use it. 

Let's say, for example, a mage buys a Gunblade. The mage can't really make use of the AD that's on the item, ultimately making it a worthless item on them, preventing them to abuse the Spell Vamp and have an AFK, sit back and heal playstyle.

Now, let's say a standard Gunblade user, like Katarina buys a Gunblade. Katarina (and basically all other Gunblade users) have unique fighting styles that require them to all-in in order to actually do damage to enemies (unless they're insanely fed). All in-ing like this is risky since they are very squishy and weak to most forms of CC, and in most cases, WILL result in them taking damage. The Spell Vamp IS ONLY THERE to help make their fighting styles not so overly punishing. 

Also, the way Gunblade users work is that they are very feast or famine, only making it so that you MUST constantly take risks for kills in order to be useful. This makes it virtually impossible for users to just sit back and sustain themselves to victory.

Edit: I've seen that you've used life steal as an argument on why WoTA is okay to be brought back. Lifesteal on melee champions is okay to be in the game for nearly the same reason that Gunblade is okay to be built on Gunblade users. ADCs on the other hand, have next to no forms of self-peel  and disengage compared to mages. They're also not bursty enough in the early game to make as much use of all the peel they already have. So in return, they get life steal. In the late game, life steal on ADCs doesn't really matter since they will most likely be bursted down by an assassin before they can even heal up.

I hope this helps you better understand why your beloved WoTA shouldn't be added back into League of Legends.
